description: Guidance or recommendations concerning prudent future action.
The act of traveling from one place to another, typically over a long distance.
The faculty by which the mind stores and remembers information.
The physical world and everything in it that is not made by people.
A feeling of happy satisfaction and enjoyment.
A task or situation that tests someone's abilities.
A person who freely offers to take part in an enterprise or undertake a task.
A group of people living in the same place or having a particular characteristic in common.
A set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something.
The surroundings or conditions in which a person, animal, or plant lives or operates.
Practical contact with and observation of facts or events.
A day or period of celebration, typically for religious reasons.
The application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes.
The wealth and resources of a country or region, especially in terms of the production and consumption of goods and services.
The governing body of a nation, state, or community.
The arts and other manifestations of human intellectual achievement regarded collectively.
The study of past events, particularly in human affairs.
The method of human communication, either spoken or written, consisting of the use of words in a structured and conventional way.
The intellectual and practical activity encompassing the systematic study of the structure and behaviour of the physical and natural world through observation and experiment.
The aggregate of people living together in a more or less ordered community.
The transmission of customs or beliefs from generation to generation.
All existing matter and space considered as a whole; the cosmos.
A person who freely offers to take part in an enterprise or undertake a task.
The act of traveling from one place to another, typically over a long distance.
The faculty by which the mind stores and remembers information.
The physical world and everything in it that is not made by people.

A task or situation that tests someone's abilities.
A person who freely offers to take part in an enterprise or undertake a task.
A group of people living in the same place or having a particular characteristic in common.
